mapper.select: select qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3 from qa where qa_num = #{qa_num};
select qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3 from qa where user_id = #{user_id};
select qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3 from qa where user_id = #{user_id} and qa_num = #{qa_num} for update;
select qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3 from qa where user_id = #{user_id} limit #{offSet}, #{pageSize};

select qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3 from qa where true
AND user_id = #{user_id} AND title LIKE concat('%', #{titleKeyword}, '%')
AND user_id = #{user_id} AND created_at between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{period} MONTH) and now()
AND user_id = #{user_id} AND title LIKE concat('%', #{title}, '%') AND created_at between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{period} MONTH) and now()
limit #{offSet}, #{pageSize};
mapper.insert: insert into qa (qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3) values (#{qa_num}, #{user_id}, #{qa_cate_num}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{email}, #{tele_num}, #{phon_num}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3});
